code: function maxPathSum(root) { let maxSum = -Infinity; function dfs(node) { if (node === null) return 0; const leftGain = Math.max(dfs(node.left), 0); const rightGain = Math.max(dfs(node.right), 0); const currentPathSum = node.val + leftGain + rightGain; maxSum = Math.max(maxSum, currentPathSum); return node.val + Math.max(leftGain, rightGain); } dfs(root); return maxSum; }
